properties.Name: CustomerFraud
properties.Description: Credit fraud committed by a customer.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: CreditFraudTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Fraud Type.

Columns.Name: FraudDate
Columns.Description: The date that the fraud was committed.

Columns.Name: FraudLossAmount
Columns.Description: The amount resulting from the fraud.

Columns.Name: LegalActionIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates that legal action was taken against the member.

Columns.Name: LegalOutcomeStatement
Columns.Description: A statement describing the results or outcome of the legal action against the member for fraud.

Columns.Name: FraudNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Fraud.
